chinese: n.暗喻，隐喻
english: metaphor

chinese: “这座城市是这个国家的心脏”，在这句话中，“心脏"是一种隐喻。
english: This city is the heart of the country, heart is used as a metaphor

chinese: n.弧；弧光
english: arc

chinese: 球在天空中划出了一道完美的弧线。
english: The ball traveled in a perfect arc through the sky

chinese: n.评价，估价
english: evaluation

chinese: 客户可以在线评估他们接受的服务。
english: Customers can make an online evaluation of the service they received

chinese: w.约束；限制
english: constrain

chinese: 乌被束缚在了笼子里。
english: The bird is constrained inside the cage

chinese: v.仔细考虑，沉思
english: ponder

chinese: 思考每天吃什么是一个有多重选择的挑战。
english: Pondering what to eat every day can be a challenge with many options

chinese: n. 数学
english: mathematics

chinese: 她正在解一道数学难题。
english: She is solving a mathematics problem

chinese: n.失职
english: malpractice

chinese: 因为医生的失职，有一根豪猪刺遗留在了他体内。
english: A quill was left in his body due to the doctor's malpractice

chinese: n. 螺旋栄；推迸器
english: propeller

chinese: 我接受过训练，学习驾驶单螺旋桨飞机。
english: I've been trained to fly single propeller planes

chinese: Mt 分析；細察
english: analyze

chinese: 他正在分析公司的月度财务情况。
english: He is analyzing the company's monthly finances

chinese: U，获得；达到（某种状态或情况）；实现n.成就
english: attain

chinese: 我终于拿到了驾照！
english: I finally attained my driving license

chinese: 几 吹风机；烘干机
english: dryer

chinese: 我用烘干机来烘干我的手。
english: I use a dryer to dry off my hands

chinese: 使骨折；使折断 四骨折；折断；裂
english: fracture

chinese: 他在训练中弄断了自己的腿。
english: He has fractured the bone in his leg during training

chinese: 区使混合，使相混；相交往，相往来
english: mingle

chinese: 笑声和歌声交织在夜空中。
english: The sounds of laughter and singing mingled in the evening air

chinese: 见性情，性格：排列，部署
english: disposition

chinese: 他的性情不好，很容易就会发火。
english: He has an unhealthy disposition; he gets angry so easily

chinese: adj，断断续续的，间歇的
english: intermittent

chinese: 雨断断续续下了一整天。
english: The intermittent rain lasted for the entire day

chinese: n.殉难
english: martyrdom

chinese: 耶稣的殉难被认为是基督教历史上的第一次殉
english: Jesus's martyrdom is considered the first in the history of Christianity
